name: The story of Kashuu Kiyomitsu and the unknown Honmaru
name_original: The story of Kashuu Kiyomitsu and the unknown Honmaru
description:
It is an adventure game that escapes from an unknown Honmaru.

■ Play time
30 points degree

■ Game introduction text
――When I woke up, it was Honmaru I didn't know.

In the ruined main enclosure that was in front of me when I lost consciousness,
You, the goddess of justice, find Kashuu Kiyomitsu sleeping.
He was tattered and looked like he hadn't been cared for in a long time...

This is a secondary creation of Touken Ranbu. I have a dream expression.
There are secondary settings and original settings.

Official secondary creation guidelines
http://www.nitroplus.co.jp/license/faq_touken.php

The strategy is published on pixiv.
https://www.pixiv.net/novel/show.php?id=13618577
